title: Road freight transport (PKD 49.41.Z)
paragraphs: International and domestic road freight transport with modern Euro 6 trucks.
Main corridors: European Union – Iran – Poland with focus on time-critical and high-value cargo.
Flexible routing through Central and Eastern Europe, Balkans, Türkiye and the Middle East.
points: Full truck load (FTL) and part load (LTL) transports.
Transport of palletised, industrial and consumer goods.
Standard and customised transport solutions for regular contracts and single trips.
24/7 direct contact with CEO & Founder for urgent transport inquiries.
